ISSUE.TITLE: Password protected Status Page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### ⚠️ Please verify that this feature request has NOT been suggested before. - [X] I checked and didn't find similar feature request ### ️ Feature Request Type UI Feature ### Feature description Require the ability to password protect a status page. ### ✔️ Solution When I visit a specific status page, it should prompt me to enter a username and a password and only display the status page once correct credentials has been entered. ### ❓ Alternatives _No response_ ### Additional Context _No response_

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Update StatusPage.vue Password protect status pages. Ref: https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/1756#issuecomment-1298710136
